description.original: Insert shortcodes into your document, e.g smileys :) or emojis :wink: . User-defined short code maps are also supported.
description.translation: Insert shortcodes into your document, e.g smileys :) or emojis :wink: . User-defined short code maps are also supported.

dict..setDesc(\"While typing: If enabled, a d: .setDesc("While typing: If enabled, a dropdown list will appear showing the actually matching tokens, if there's any.")
dict..setDesc(\"Replace the selected token wi: .setDesc("Replace the selected token with its matching icon. If enabled, the choosed token's icon will be inserted directly into the text instead of the the token's name.")
dict..setDesc('Only available when \"Show sug: .setDesc('Only available when "Show suggestions dropdown list" is enabled')
dict..setDesc(\"Maximum number of suggestions: .setDesc("Maximum number of suggestions to show in the dropdown list (per group; per code map)")
dict.currentModeDesc = 'Completion (Suggested: currentModeDesc = 'Completion (Suggested): Highlight if the current word is the beginning of a token. E.g. ":smi" matches ":smile:"';
